name: Crazy Scientst
description:
I Finished The Game Finally..

Its a game jam and the theme was Death isn't the end
I made all the arts and the code
But I used the internet for the music :)

These are the music I used:
https://opengameart.org/content/high-tech-lab
https://opengameart.org/content/electronic-friends

The game was made by: 3boood_pro using Godot Game Engine
